properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 1:54PM CST until January 11 at 2:30PM CST by NWS Huntsville AL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southeastern Franklin County in Middle Tennessee...

* Until 230 PM CST.

* At 154 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cowan, or 7
miles southeast of Winchester, moving east at 30 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Winchester, Decherd, Cowan, Sewanee, Anderson, Alto, St. Andrews
and Sherwood.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for northeastern
Alabama...and Middle Tennessee.

A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can
develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. Although a tornado is not
immediately likely, if one is spotted, act quickly and move to a
place of safety inside a sturdy structure such as a basement or small
interior room.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.
